channel.title: Can I put a collaboration in my EP?
channel.description: For the second song in my EP- The Underworld, I want to put a collab song that I might make. Is it possible to do this?

item.title: Can I put a collaboration in my EP?
item.dc:creator: AnirudhKhanna
item.source: Can I put a collaboration in my EP?

item.title: Can I put a collaboration in my EP?
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Artists put collaborations on their albums all the time - but you need the other person’s consent first; preferably in writing so there’s no confusion over what was agreed.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I put a collaboration in my EP?
